title: The Pradeeps of Pittsburgh Cancelled at Prime Video After 1 Season
description: Prime Video is moving out of the Steel City, cancelling the comedy The Pradeeps of Pittsburgh after just one season, our sister site Deadline reports. The series — which was one of TVLine’s Hidden Gems You May Have Missed from last year’s TV — starred Naveen Andrews (Lost) and stand-up comic Sindhu Vee as the […]
author: Vlada Gelman

title: Critics Choice Awards 2025: Complete List of Winners (Updating Live)
description: After two postponements due to the recent Los Angeles wildfires, the 30th annual Critics Choice Awards are being held at last on Friday night. Heading into this year’s ceremony — held live from the Barker Hangar in Santa Monica, and broadcast on E! — FX’s acclaimed drama Shōgun led the TV pack with six total […]
author: Riannucci

title: The Rookie Season 7 Episode 6 Spoilers: Will Nolan Arrest His Own Wife?

title: Why is One Chicago So Averse to (Healthy) Pregnancy Arcs?
